剈字的基本解释

剈
yuān
剜；挑取。
盆、瓮底部的孔。
小割而深。
曲剪；曲刀。

剈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuān］
［《廣韻》烏玄切，平先，影。］
(1)剜，抉而取之。
(2)甑或盆、瓮底下的孔。
(3)小割而深。
(4)曲剪刀。

剈字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【刀字部】　剈； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页140第02
〔古文〕?【集韻】縈玄切，音淵。【說文】挑取也。一曰窐也。【玉篇】剜也。【六書故】小割而深也。又【集韻】娟悅切，涓入聲。義同。或作?。

剈字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
剈字的起名意思

暂无。

Cut
Basic explanation of words
Cut
yuān
Gouge; pick.
Holes at the bottom of basins and urns.
Small cut and deep.
Curved shears; curved knives.
Cut
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuān］
["Guangyun" Wu Xuanqie, Ping Xian, Shadow. ]
(1) Gouge, choose it.
(2) The hole under the retort or basin or urn.
(3) Small cut but deep.
(4) Curved scissors.
Cut
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Knife word department] 　剈; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 140 02
[Ancient text]? [Jiyun] Yingxuanqi, Yinyuan. [Said the text] Pick and choose. One said Qianye. [Jade articles] Cut out also. 【Liu Shu Gu】Small cut but deep. [Ji Yun] Juan Yue cuts, and the sound starts. The same meaning. Or for?.
